https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Arq2fAurzAubeKNL8UewS6bYvOl.jpg The ratings of a radio sex-talk show are dropping. But after a listener is murdered, the sexy host finds her popularity is rising again. Is she behind the killings, or is it her producer--or someone else? Bare Deception
